metadata.Title: CVE-2021-37147 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: Improper input validation vulnerability in header parsing of Apache TrafficServer allows an attacker to smuggle requests. This issue affects ApacheTraffic Server 8.0.0 to 8.1.2 and 9.0.0 to 9.1.0.

criterions.comment: trafficserver: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
